TopicTitle: Love the Game, thought I'd check out the forums

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I found this game through the Kotaku article and I love it soooo much. The last few updates have really made me addicted and I cannot wait for what the game will bring in the future. I spend my days planning new missions in my head and my nights slinging those poor kerbals around space. My Skyrim character is getting jealous. ;P

I used to use all sorts of mods, but recently found much pleasure in going 100% stock. Landing on the Mun and coming back is so much more nerve-racking, but also much more satisfying I find. I keep track of my misadventures on a blog. Not sure if posting links is OK, but it\'s entirely about KSP so I hope it\'s OK. Let me know what you think!

http://kerbal.blogspot.com

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
